import { useState } from "react"; const Item = (props) => { const v = props.details; const addToCart = props.addToCart; const [num, setNum] = useState(1) const changeVal = (val) => { setNum(Math.max(num + val, 1)) } return (<>

{v.name}

{v.type}

RM {v.price}.00

); } export default Item;
